title: Halloween (Harrowing) Skins
body:
Hey Riot, 

I am posting as i am curious if your staff would be interested in some creepy Halloween skins, Coming from an Australian who has no idea about what Halloween is even about doesn't help my point although i am very interested in the creepy, disturbing and brutal creations that come from such a theme.

I was curious as to what extent you are allowed to create skins. For example how gruesome, explicit and darn right adult themed these skins can get seeing as people of all ages can play this video game.

I had three ideas for Halloween inspired skins. 

The first being a Marionette or Manikin doll Orianna. Similar to these examples:

http://www.google.com.au/imgres?imgurl=https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/f9/3d/d8/f93dd81cb396ae0d27331a39a24e27b1.jpg&imgrefurl=https://www.pinterest.com/pin/321866704595713833/&h=640&w=480&tbnid=zRA25KsyrJH9VM:&docid=BkLartzbrsev8M&ei=ieQxVuqVD5CDoQT85oiYCw&tbm=isch&ved=0CCcQMygMMAxqFQoTCKr-vOus58gCFZBBiAodfDMCsw

http://www.google.com.au/imgres?imgurl=https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/b0/c6/64/b0c66449a9cd4d946bd018330d13ba51.jpg&imgrefurl=https://www.pinterest.com/yackjak/marionette/&h=400&w=236&tbnid=9sI5w5HSUxkMyM:&docid=GKFKJsAsKEK76M&ei=h-UxVrq4A5TSoASxlZCICw&tbm=isch&ved=0CCAQMygEMARqFQoTCPqXwOSt58gCFRQpiAodsQoEsQ&biw=1600&bih=775

http://www.google.com.au/imgres?imgurl=https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/4c/0f/9f/4c0f9fb63bd5ae036b646ca26b85ded3.jpg&imgrefurl=https://www.pinterest.com/pin/30680841186874119/&h=600&w=400&tbnid=w2y0LT8H6SygaM:&docid=5K22zCjhxWy-7M&itg=1&ei=h-UxVrq4A5TSoASxlZCICw&tbm=isch&ved=0CCEQMygFMAVqFQoTCPqXwOSt58gCFRQpiAodsQoEsQ&biw=1600&bih=775

( Sorry for the rush job google search)

The second being a Plague Doctor Swain. Similar to this possibly:

http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20150215000918/creepypasta/images/3/30/Plague_doctor_by_neamhni-d5lzah6.jpg

The final skin being something similar to the Texas chainsaw massacre for Doctor Mundo. Throwing chainsaws on the rift:

http://cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/texas-chainsaw-massacre-1974.jpeg

http://horrorfilmcentral.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/zz20.jpg

Although you guys have probably brainstormed skins until the early hours of the morn, These are just a few ideas from a player. 

P.S Jason Voorhees Jax ;)

Thanks for the game you lovely people, keep up the great work.
